hero.content:
World Cup mural gig helps Doha artist turn hobby into lifeline

Filipino painter Michael Conjusta was hired by Qatari authorities to paint graffiti murals during the 2022 World Cup. Michael Conjusta, a Doha-based freelance artist was going about his day one August afternoon when he received an unexpected WhatsApp message with an offer to paint graffiti murals at football stadiums during the FIFA 2022 World Cup.

aljazeera.com

primary.title: Press Release - 'Defend Press Freedom': Hontiveros files bill to decriminalize libel
primary.description: Senator Risa Hontiveros on Tuesday filed Senate Bill No. 1593, a bill to decriminalize libel, highlighting how current libel laws have been used and abused to suppress freedom of the press.

secondary.title: Senator Hontiveros files bill seeking to decriminalize libel
secondary.description: The announcement comes after the conviction of Baguio City journalist and Rappler contributor Frank Cimatu of cyber libel

secondary.title: Journalist Frank Cimatu convicted of cyber libel over ex-DA chief post
secondary.description: A Quezon City regional trial court convicts Baguio-based journalist Frank Cimatu of cyber libel with up to five years of imprisonment over a 2017 Facebook post he made about former Agriculture Secretary Manny Piñol.

secondary.title: Transcript: Senate Bill 1593 Decriminalizing Libel
secondary.description: Read the full transcript of Senate Bill 1593 introduced by Senator Risa Hontiveros to decriminalize libel. In it are provisions preventing the courts to imprison defendants accused of defamation on social media platforms.

carousel.title: Ube — The Uber Ingredient Of 2023
carousel.description: According to the consumer trend forecasts, ube, a purple yam that has played a central part in Filipino food culture for more than four centuries, will be a huge global hit in 2023.

carousel.title: Percentage of Filipinos who smoke, use tobacco decreases to 19.5% — survey
carousel.description: The prevalence of current tobacco use and smoking among Filipinos aged 15 and above decreased in 2021 to 19.5%, according to the results of the 2021 Global Adult Tobacco Survey (GATS).

carousel.title: Gogoro to pilot battery swapping and Smartscooters in Philippines next year
carousel.description: Taiwanese battery swapping startup Gogoro is launching a B2B pilot with a logistics provider in Manila in the first quarter of 2023.

carousel.title: USA Basketball men to play WC games in Manila
carousel.description: FIBA announced Monday that USA Basketball will play all its games at the 2023 World Cup in Manila, Philippines.
